newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Moroccan CPI up 0.5 pct in September.
newsitem.headline: Moroccan CPI up 0.5 pct in September.

text.p: Morocco's consumer price index rose 0.5 percent to 146.8 in September from 146.0 points in August, the Statistics Directorate said on Wednesday.
It attributed the increase to a rise in costs for leisure and cultural activities -- up 3.5 percent -- and food price rises totalling 0.7 percent.
The average CPI rise during the first nine months of the year was 2.9 percent higher than during the same period in 1995.
The base year for the index set at 100 points is 1989.
